mecard.responder

Class CustomerQueryable

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.responder.Responder
      • mecard.responder.CustomerQueryable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    APIResponder, DummyResponder, SIP2Responder

    public abstract class CustomerQueryable
extends Responder
    Indicates that the implementer can query the status of theusers.

      • getCustomer

        public abstract void getCustomer(Response response)
        Gets the customer account information.

      • isAuthorized

        public abstract boolean isAuthorized(java.lang.String suppliedPin,
                   Customer customer)
        Tests if the pin supplied from the web site matches the user's account pin.
        Parameters:
        suppliedPin - - String data used to test against Customer pin.
        customer - customer data.
        Returns:
        true if the supplied pin matched the account pin and false otherwise.

      • meetsMeCardRequirements

        protected boolean meetsMeCardRequirements(Customer customer,
                              java.lang.String additionalData)
        Tests if the customer meets the required MeCard requirements. MeCard users must be:
        • Over the age of 18
        • Must to be a reciprocal customer at the home library.
        • Must be in good standing at their home library.
        • Must be a resident of the home library's service area.
        • Must have a valid expiry date.
        • Must have mandatory account fields filled with valid data.
        Parameters:
        customer -
        additionalData -
        Returns:
        true if the customer meets the MeCard participation requirements and false otherwise.
